title: Star Guardian Miss Fortune recall missing red spotlight.
body:
Noticed that Star Guardian Miss Fortune's recall has her red spotlight missing. Minor bug but just wanted to bring awareness. :)

https://imgur.com/WpNmOwf
https://imgur.com/nh0hFjQ

replies.body:
Hiya! We'll have a fix for this in 8.2.

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=5EUBEHWq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-12T18:07:30.760+0000)
>
> Hiya! We'll have a fix for this in 8.2.
> 
> {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

so MF one trick here, when can I expect y'all to add that MF sticker to the FB messenger LoL sticker pack?
AFAIK, we're keeping these stickers exclusive to boards.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=5EUBEHWq,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2018-01-24T17:47:31.545+0000)
>
> AFAIK, we're keeping these stickers exclusive to boards.

I just died. It is waaaay to cute to not be accessible on mobile. Its so expressive and I use these stickers allot to express myself and my fandom. that is literally right up there with the Sugoi Zed sticker :(
